synopsis.text: Paikuhan and Goku face an unexpected challenge in the afterlife when a negligent act leads to the creation of Janemba, a formidable demon with reality-altering powers. As the dimensions merge and the deceased return to life, Goku and his fellow warriors on Earth are beset by a host of enemies. In a desperate struggle against Janemba, Goku finds an unlikely ally in Vegeta, who joins him in the battle. Together, they must find a way to overcome this nearly invincible foe and restore balance to the universe. With the stakes higher than ever, can Goku and Vegeta put aside their differences and defeat Janemba before it's too late? Join our heroes in this action-packed adventure as they face their greatest challenge yet!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
